thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 30 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Analog Devices quarterly revenue rises 32 percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Analog Devices quarterly revenue rises 32 percent
text:
(Reuters) - Chipmaker Analog Devices Inc ( ADI.O ) on Wednesday reported a 32 percent rise in quarterly revenue driven by continued demand for its sensor chips used in autonomous cars, networking and the industrial market.
Net income rose to $379.8 million, or $1.01 per share, in the second quarter ended May 5, from $93.6 million, or 27 cents a share, a year earlier.
Revenue rose to $1.51 billion from $1.15 billion.
Reporting by Sonam Rai in Bengaluru; Editing by Shounak Dasgupta
